definitions.definition: A wheel having a groove in the rim for a rope to work in, and set in a block, mast, or similar; the wheel of a pulley .
A sliding scutcheon for covering a keyhole .

main_definition: A wheel having a groove in the rim for a rope to work in, and set in a block, mast, or similar; the wheel of a pulley .
secondary_definitions: A sliding scutcheon for covering a keyhole .
